{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Nexaira |model=NexConnect |revision=(R-NEXUSB08) |upc=094922979308 |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=2008 |fcc_date=06/07/2006 |manuf_country=China |manuf=AMIT |manuf_model=WMQ137AM |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PBLWL533M |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=AMRISC |cpu1_model=20000;AMRISC 20000, R3210GCL3H; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320T-70TCP |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5SV16M16BS-6K |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, PCMCIA (32-bit),USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=AMIT WL533MAM |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2561S |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2527 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A |eth_chip3_brand=IC+ |eth_chip3_model=IP101A |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=NexWare |default_ssid_regex=^NexWare$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=admin |oui=00:50:18 |oui_eth=00:50:18 |default_ch=5 }} [http://nexaira.com/nexconnect-router Product page]
[http://nexaira.com/pdf/router/NexConnectUserManual.pdf User manual] The device is a [[AMIT WMQ137AM]]. The router is running OpenWrt by default. LuCI is the web configuration interface. "11340Y20CM00001B1" is silkscreened on the board. There is a '''TI''' PCI1510 7A85A8L7W on board for the CardBus controller. The default WPA key appears to be '''password'''. The power adapter included with the device is a '''NexAira''' SA115B-05 (5V, 3A). This device is presumed to have been released in 2008 per archive.org data.. ==Images== File:NexAira NexConnect angled.jpg|angled shot File:NexAira NexConnect front.jpg|front File:NexAira NexConnect back.jpg|back File:NexAira NexConnect PCMCIA.jpg|PCMCIA slot [[Has images::external| ]] File:NexAira NexConnect bottom.jpg|bottom File:NexAira NexConnect power adapter.jpg|power adapter [[Has images::label| ]][[Has images::power adapter| ]]
